alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:55PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Stillwater, Yellowstone, central Musselshell and southeastern Golden Valley Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 752 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles west of Roundup to 18 miles northwest of Billings Heights to 11 miles northeast of Columbus. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 55 mph, along with brief moderate to heavy rain and some lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Billings, Roundup, Laurel, Lockwood, Huntley, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Worden, Billings West End, Ballantine, Musselshell, Broadview, Lavina, Pompeys Pillar, Molt, Acton, Park City, Klein and Comanche. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone
